kimchi.subtitle: Real-time comparison of coin prices between Upbit (KRW) and Binance (USDT). Auto-refreshes every 30 seconds.
kimchi.whatIsDesc: Kimchi Premium refers to the price difference of cryptocurrencies between Korean exchanges (Upbit, etc.) and overseas exchanges (Binance, etc.). A positive premium occurs when Korean demand is high, and a negative premium when demand is low. Typically 1-3%, but can exceed 10% during bull runs.
